ChooseAdmin.description: Sankhani munthu wina kuti ayendetse matchanelo ndi ma akaunti.
ConfirmAccountDetails.confirmAccountUser: Akaunti yanu iphatikizana ndi akaunti iyi mu '{target_facility}'. Muyenera kugwiritsa ntchito dzina lolowera komanso nambala yachinsinsi ya akaunti iyi kuyambira tsopano.
ConfirmAccountUsername.confirmAccountLin: Mwatsala pang'ono kulowa m'malo ophunzirira a '{target_facility}' as '{username}'.
Munkhoza kupitiriza ndi dzina lolowera limeneli kapena tsekulani akaunti yatsopano ya '{target_facility}'.
ConfirmChangeFacility.changeFacilityInfo: Mwatsala pang'ono kupititsa akaunti yanu komanso zokhudza kakhonzedwe kanu ku malo ophunzirira a '{target_facility}'. Uthenga wanuwu ukhala ulipobe ndipo ukhonzanso kufikilidwa ndi oyang'anira malo ophunzirira ano.

Mtundu wa akaunti yanu usintha kuchoka ku '{role}' kupita ku 'wophunzira' ndipo simuthanso kuyendetsa za zophunzirira pa chipangizochi. Muyenera kupeza munthu wina wokhala ndi zilolezo za woyang'anira mu '{facility}' kuti musinthe mtundu wa akaunti yanu kubwerera ku '{role}'.
Muthanso kufufuza akaunti yophatikizana nayo mu '{target_facility}'. Mbiri ya kakhonzedwe yochokera ku ma akaunti awiriwa iphatikizana kupanga akaunti imodzi.
ConfirmMerge.confirmMergeInfoLine: Mwatsala pang'ono kuphatikiza ma akaunti awiri ndi uthenga wawo wa momwe akugwirira ntchito. Uthengawu ndi monga kugwiritsa ntchito zophunzirira, nthawi yomwe mwatenga komanso malikisi. Izi sizingasinthidwe.
ConfirmMerge.consequences: Ndikumvetsetsa zotsatira zimene zichitike ndikaphatikiza ma akaunti
CreateAccount.description: Akaunti yatsopano ya '{fullName}' m'malo ophunzirira a '{targetFacility}'
CreatePassword.description: ‘{targetFacility}’ ikufunika kuti ma akaunti akhale ndi mawu a chinsinsi. Lowetsani mawu a chinsinsi omwe mukufuna kugwiritsa ntchito pa ‘{username}’ mu ‘{targetFacility}’
CreatePassword.documentTitle: Pangani mawu a chinsinsi a tsopano
CreatePassword.hint: Mukhonza kulowetsa mawu anu a chinsinsi ngati muli nawo kale.
MergeAccountDialog.mergeAccountUserInfo: Lowetsani Mawu a chinsinsi a akaunti '{username}' m'malo ophunzirira a '{target_facility}' amene mukufuna kuphatikiza ndi akaunti yanu.
MergeAccountDialog.mergeAccountUsingAdmi: Lembani dzina lolowera komanso mawu a chinsinsi nambala a woyang'anira malo ophunzirira kapena woyang'anira wamkulu wa malo ophunzirira a '{target_facility}'.
MergeDifferentAccounts.mergeAccountUserI: Lowetsani dzina lolowera la akaunti yomwe mukufuna kuphatikiza ku akaunti yanu.
MergeDifferentAccounts.userDoesNotExist: Dzina lolowera limenelo silikupezeka m'malo ophunzirira
MergeFacility.failedTaskError: Kuphatikiza zochita za '{username}' kwalephereka chifukwa cha mavuto ena okhudza kulumikiza ku '{target_facility}'. Chonde, onani netiweki yanu ndipo yesaninso.
MergeFacility.success: Mwakwanitsa kukhala nawo pa malo ophunzirira a '{target_facility}'
MergeFacility.userAdminError: Wogwiritsa ntchito '{username}' alipo kale mu '{target_facility}' ndipo siwophunzira. Chonde, sankhani dzina lina lolowera.
MergeFacility.userExistsError: Wogwiritsa ntchito '{username}' alipo kale mu '{target_facility}'. Chonde, sankhani dzina lina lolowera.
ProfilePage.changeLearningFacilityDescri: Pititsani akaunti yanu komanso uthenga wa momwe ikugwirira ntchito ku malo ena ophunzirira.
ProfilePage.learnModalLine1: Malo ophunzirira akutanthauza malo amene mukukhazikitsa kuti mugwiritse ntchito pulogalamu ya Kolibri, monga pasukulu, malo ena ophunzirira kapena panyumba.
ProfilePage.learnModalLine2: Kusuntha akaunti yanu kupita ku malo ena ophunzirira kukutathauza kuti oyang'anira malo amenewo akhonza kupeza uthenga wanu.
ProfilePage.manageContent: Kuona zokhudza matchanelo ndi zinthu zina
SelectFacility.noPermissionToJoinFacilit: Mulibe chilolezo kuti mukhale nawo pamalo ophunzirira awa
TaskStrings.importSuccessStatus: Malo ophunzirira a '{facilityName}' atheka kulowetsedwa m'chipangizochi
TaskStrings.taskLODFinishedByLabel: Akaunti '{fullname}' kuchokera ku '{facilityname}' yatheka kulowa m'chipangizochi
UsernameExists.changeFacilityInfoLine1: Akaunti yokhala ndi dzina lolowera '{username}' ilipo kale m'malo ophunzirira a '{target_facility}'. Mukhonza kuphatikiza akaunti yanu ku akaunti iyi.
UsernameExists.changeFacilityInfoLine2: Mwa njira ina, mukhonza kutsekula akaunti yatsopano ndipo uthenga wonse wa momwe ikugwirira ntchito muwupititsa ku akaunti yatsopanoyi.
